tokens.text: controls foliage color appearance for rendering

title: Minecraft Foliage Appearance
description: Sets the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Biome Foliage Appearance
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Set the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

fields.title: Color
fields.description: RGB color of foliage, or a Foliage Color Map object.
